Openerp Notes (1). 序

1. 通用ERP模块

ERP系统核心应用一般包括：

  • Sales Orders(SO)
  • Purchase orders(PO)
  • Accounting and finance(General Ledger, GL)
  • Manufacturing Resource Planning(MRP)
  • Customer Relationship Management(CRM)
  • Human Resources(HR)

1.1 Sales Orders(SO)

Selling products to your customer.
